title: Valorization of treated wastewater from the soaking of baby alpaca skin fur
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Jacqueline Jannet Dioses Morales, Lena Asunción Téllez Monzón, Rodolfo Linares Nieto, Paola Jorge-Montalvo, Lizardo Visitación-Figueroa
